messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I don’t care who you are--no one
interferes with my treasure hunting!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I heard there’s an intriguing stone
monument around, so I came running.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’m still here...and still searching
for treasures.However, a battle with you
is a treasure I can’t pass up!
